entry.title: canyon/3d-web-viewer: This project is a lightweight web application developed with ReactJS and TailwindCSS. It enables the visualization of 3D point cloud data and incorporates basic GIS viewing features.
entry.content: This project is a lightweight web application developed with ReactJS and TailwindCSS. It enables the visualization of 3D point cloud data and incorporates basic GIS viewing features.

entry.title: C-Teo/minerva: Minerva is a lightweight art portfolio website built with JavaScript, React, and Vite, designed for fast performance and a minimalistic aesthetic. It offers a sleek, responsive platform for artists to showcase their work and effortlessly share their creative journeys online.
entry.content: Minerva is a lightweight art portfolio website built with JavaScript, React, and Vite, designed for fast performance and a minimalistic aesthetic. It offers a sleek, responsive platform for artists to showcase their work and effortlessly share their creative journeys online.

entry.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
entry.content: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

entry.title: jerry11671/hng-number-classification-api: A fast and lightweight REST API that classifies numbers based on their mathematical properties. It determines whether a number is prime, perfect, Armstrong, odd, or even and provides a fun fact from the Numbers API. Built with nodejs, deployed for public access, and fully documented.
entry.content: A fast and lightweight REST API that classifies numbers based on their mathematical properties. It determines whether a number is prime, perfect, Armstrong, odd, or even and provides a fun fact from the Numbers API. Built with nodejs, deployed for public access, and fully documented.
